company.name: UPCYCLED BUILDING MATERIALS AUSTRALIA PTY LTD (T/A SAVEBOARD)

image: products/UPCYCLED BUILDING MATERIALS AUSTRALIA PTY LTD (T/A SAVEBOARD)/Waitoa_Garage.jpg
product_description: Pre-finished internal wall & ceiling lining for residential and commercial applications

product_categories.category_name: Internal Wall Linings, finishes and partition systems

transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: By shipping to client central distribution hubs (KFC, Woolworths) where materials are consolidated then sent to project sites.
minimisation_design_strategy: 1200mm wide panels, standard lengths (2.4m, 2.7m, 3.0m) and custom cut up to 6000mm in length
risk_of_harm_posed_description: If not properly recycled, it contains between 20-50% soft plastics (our glue). Like any plastic component will generate microplastics at signs of wear.
factory_finished_description: Pre-finished surface, requiring no wet trades on site
applied_finish_required_description: LDPE moisture resistant finish showing the exposed surface of our boards
type_of_packaging: Timber bearers (non-treated) and shrink wrap (recyclable with saveBOARD).
